explains: adj. 临界的；边界的；所属不清的；暧昧的
n. 边界线，边界；中间地带；暧昧状态
wordGroup: borderline personality 边缘型人格；边缘性人格障碍
borderline personality disorder 边缘型人格障碍

sentences.en: This biography sometimes crosses the borderline between fact and fiction.
sentences.cn: 这部传记有时混淆了事实和虚构。

sentences.en: Some were obviously unsuitable and could be ruled out at once. Others were borderline cases.
sentences.cn: 一些显然不合适，可以马上被排除。另一些勉强合格。

sentences.en: In borderline cases teachers will take the final decision, based on the student's previous work.
sentences.cn: 在难以定夺的情况下，教师将根据学生先前的作业做出最终评分。
